title: 建立了一个水桶服
author: LoveJJ

replies.author: 159789tim
replies.txt_content: 把开服目录下的server.properties文件里的东西打开发过来看看

replies.author: SkyCatcher
replies.txt_content:
server.properties里面这行online-mode=false
复制代码就可以了

replies.author: michael2607
replies.txt_content:
你可能開到正版驗證，阿然後你用盜版登入....
去伺服的檔案把這行改成這樣
online-mode=false

replies.author: 星龙醉梦
replies.txt_content: 进去打/bad login 密码 重复密码
